item.title: Trump says he’s ‘giving serious consideration to taking away’ Rosie O’Donnell’s U.S. citizenship
item.description: That's despite a decades-old Supreme Court ruling that expressly prohibits such an action by the government.

item.title: Nursing homes struggle to recruit staff as Trump attacks sources of immigrant workers: ‘We feel completely beat up right now’
item.description: Facilities for older adults and disabled people fear even more dramatic impacts are ahead as pipelines of potential workers slow to a trickle with an ...

item.title: Panasonic’s Megan Myungwon Lee wants half her EV battery supply chain inside North America by 2030
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: OCBC’s next CEO shows the Singaporean bank is still betting on ASEAN-China ties for growth
item.description: OCBC’s CEO-to-be comes with a wealth of China experience, including a five-year stint leading DBS’s institutional banking business in China.

item.title: China exports surge 5.8% in June as business rush through orders during U.S. tariff reprieve
item.description: Exports to the United States fell 16%, but that was less than half the 34.5% drop seen in May.
